segment.source: MED-V Client Tools
segment.target: MED-V Client Tools

segment.source: MED-V Client Tools
segment.target: MED-V Client Tools

segment.source: MED-V Client Tools
segment.target: MED-V Client Tools

segment.source: MED-V includes the following client tools:
segment.target: MED-V includes the following client tools:

segment.source: File Transfer Tool
segment.target: File Transfer Tool

segment.source: Image Downloads
segment.target: Image Downloads

segment.source: Diagnostics
segment.target: Diagnostics

segment.source: File Transfer Tool
segment.target: File Transfer Tool

segment.source: The File Transfer Tool can be used to copy files or folders from the MED-V workspace to the host and vice versa.
segment.target: The File Transfer Tool can be used to copy files or folders from the MED-V workspace to the host and vice versa.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The File Transfer Tool is enabled only when the MED-V workspace is running.
segment.target: The File Transfer Tool is enabled only when the MED-V workspace is running.

segment.source: To copy files or folders from a MED-V workspace that is currently running
segment.target: To copy files or folders from a MED-V workspace that is currently running

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, point to Tools, and then click File Transfer.
segment.target: On the submenu, point to Tools, and then click File Transfer.

segment.source: In the File Transfer tool, in the Select transfer direction field, click one of the following transfer options:
segment.target: In the File Transfer tool, in the Select transfer direction field, click one of the following transfer options:

segment.source: Copy from My Computer to 'default workspace' Workspace—Transfer a file or folder from the host to the active MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Copy from My Computer to 'default workspace' Workspace—Transfer a file or folder from the host to the active MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Copy from 'default workspace' Workspace to My Computer—Transfer a file or folder from the active MED-V workspace to the host.
segment.target: Copy from 'default workspace' Workspace to My Computer—Transfer a file or folder from the active MED-V workspace to the host.

segment.source: Select the file or folder to copy by doing one of the following:
segment.target: Select the file or folder to copy by doing one of the following:

segment.source: In the File to copy field, type the full path to the directory where the file or folder to copy is located.
segment.target: In the File to copy field, type the full path to the directory where the file or folder to copy is located.

segment.source: Click Browse to browse the directory where the file or folder to copy is located.
segment.target: Click Browse to browse the directory where the file or folder to copy is located.

segment.source: Select the Copy a folder check box to copy an entire folder.
segment.target: Select the Copy a folder check box to copy an entire folder.

segment.source: Select the destination where the file is being transferred by doing one of the following:
segment.target: Select the destination where the file is being transferred by doing one of the following:

segment.source: In the Destination field, type the full path of the directory where the file or folder will be transferred.
segment.target: In the Destination field, type the full path of the directory where the file or folder will be transferred.

segment.source: Click Browse to browse to the directory where the file or folder will be transferred.
segment.target: Click Browse to browse to the directory where the file or folder will be transferred.

segment.source: Click Start.
segment.target: Click Start.

segment.source: The file transfer begins.
segment.target: The file transfer begins.

segment.source: Image Downloads
segment.target: Image Downloads

segment.source: When a new image update is available for a MED-V workspace and the MED-V workspace is active, the user receives a message indicating that a new image is ready for download.
segment.target: When a new image update is available for a MED-V workspace and the MED-V workspace is active, the user receives a message indicating that a new image is ready for download.

segment.source: To view available images for download
segment.target: To view available images for download

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, point to Tools, and then click Image Downloads.
segment.target: On the submenu, point to Tools, and then click Image Downloads.

segment.source: All available image downloads are displayed.
segment.target: All available image downloads are displayed.

segment.source: Diagnostics
segment.target: Diagnostics

segment.source: The diagnostics tool provides all diagnostic information.
segment.target: The diagnostics tool provides all diagnostic information.

segment.source: To view diagnostics
segment.target: To view diagnostics

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, point to Help, and then click MED-V Diagnostics.
segment.target: On the submenu, point to Help, and then click MED-V Diagnostics.

segment.source: In the Diagnostics tool, review all diagnostic information.
segment.target: In the Diagnostics tool, review all diagnostic information.

segment.source: The following functions can be performed using the diagnostic tool:
segment.target: The following functions can be performed using the diagnostic tool:

segment.source: Gather diagnostic logs—Gather the diagnostic logs, and place them on the desktop.
segment.target: Gather diagnostic logs—Gather the diagnostic logs, and place them on the desktop.

segment.source: Update policy—The MED-V workspace policy automatically connects to the MED-V server to refresh the policy every 15 minutes.
segment.target: Update policy—The MED-V workspace policy automatically connects to the MED-V server to refresh the policy every 15 minutes.

segment.source: However, a user can use this option to perform a manual refresh immediately.
segment.target: However, a user can use this option to perform a manual refresh immediately.

segment.source: Enable or Disable diagnostic mode—Display the virtual machine window.
segment.target: Enable or Disable diagnostic mode—Display the virtual machine window.

segment.source: This function is helpful when, for example, you need to see MED-V workspace windows that are not displayed.
segment.target: This function is helpful when, for example, you need to see MED-V workspace windows that are not displayed.

segment.source: Browse image store—View all available MED-V workspace images.
segment.target: Browse image store—View all available MED-V workspace images.
